title: [Featurerequest] call Powershell and let response modify parameter
author: wolfgangp-tak
body_snippet:
Hello 

we are using a secure access tool to manage the access to RDP
- the tool creates a tunnel (opens a session on a dynamic localhost port)
- and also provides a password/username for every connection

It would be good to be able to execute a powershell script before each connections, which can modify the properties (username, password, protocol,.. more)

br
Wolfgang
